name: Defend of the Cube (13ORG)
description:
Defend of the cube is a game to play in your browser. The AI waves are getting stronger every time.

Press C to cubify. Other controls are select, right click to move,
ctrl+123 to group. Gather resources from Red Rings of clones, and expand
vision from Green Fields. Tower down (T) the cubes, but you loose them to defend and block the path.
